name: Orn the tiny forest sprite
description: Beautiful levels and a lovable hero take the spotlight in Orn the tiny forest sprite, a 3D side-scroller inspired by both classic and modern platformers.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista  or higher Processor: 2.0GHZ  or better Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 950 equivalent or higher DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 3 GB available space
